de: In this local shop located in the heart of Lamastre, you will find a nice range of clothes and lingerie for men and women. Collections for everyone. Do not hesitate to come and see us, we welcome you a few steps from the Mastrou station. Many promotions and sales all year round.
ru: In this local shop located in the heart of Lamastre, you will find a nice range of clothes and lingerie for men and women. Collections for everyone. Do not hesitate to come and see us, we welcome you a few steps from the Mastrou station. Many promotions and sales all year round.
en: In this local shop located in the heart of Lamastre, you will find a nice range of clothes and lingerie for men and women. Collections for everyone. Do not hesitate to come and see us, we welcome you a few steps from the Mastrou station. Many promotions and sales all year round.
it: In this local shop located in the heart of Lamastre, you will find a nice range of clothes and lingerie for men and women. Collections for everyone. Do not hesitate to come and see us, we welcome you a few steps from the Mastrou station. Many promotions and sales all year round.
fr:
Dans ce commerce de proximité situé au coeur de Lamastre, vous trouverez une jolie gamme de vêtements et de lingerie pour hommes et femmes. 
N'hésitez pas à venir nous voir, à moins de 20 mètres de la gare du Mastrou.
zh: In this local shop located in the heart of Lamastre, you will find a nice range of clothes and lingerie for men and women. Collections for everyone. Do not hesitate to come and see us, we welcome you a few steps from the Mastrou station. Many promotions and sales all year round.

nl: In deze buurtwinkel in het hart van Lamastre vindt u een mooi assortiment kleding en lingerie voor mannen en vrouwen. Collecties voor iedereen. Aarzel niet om ons te bezoeken, wij verwelkomen u op enkele stappen van het station Mastrou. Veel promoties en verkopen het hele jaar door.

de:
Dienstag, Mittwoch, Donnerstag, Freitag, Samstag: 09:00 bis 12:00 Uhr, 13:45 bis 19:00 Uhr

Sonderangebote je nach Veranstaltung.
Messen / Muttertag/ Vatertag / Ausverkauf / Valentinstag / Black Friday / Weihnachten
en:
Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday: 09h to 12h, 13h45 to 19h

Promotion according to the events.
Fairs / Mother's Day / Father's Day / Sales / Valentine's Day / Black Friday / Christmas
it:
Martedì, mercoledì, giovedì, venerdì, sabato: dalle 9.00 alle 12.00, dalle 13.45 alle 19.00

Promozione in base agli eventi.
Fiere / Festa della mamma / Festa del papà / Saldi / San Valentino / Black Friday / Natale
fr:
Mardi, Mercredi, Jeudi, Vendredi, Samedi : 09h à 12h, 13h45 à 19h

Promotion suivant les événements.
Foires  / Fête des Mères/ Fête des Pères /  Soldes  /  Saint Valentin / Black Friday  /  Noël
es:
Martes, miércoles, jueves, viernes y sábado: de 9.00 a 12.00 y de 13.45 a 19.00 horas

Promoción según eventos.
Ferias / Día de la Madre / Día del Padre / Rebajas / San Valentín / Black Friday / Navidad
nl:
Dinsdag, woensdag, donderdag, vrijdag, zaterdag: 9u tot 12u, 13u45 tot 19u

Promotie volgens evenementen.
Beurzen / Moederdag / Vaderdag / Uitverkoop / Valentijnsdag / Black Friday / Kerstmis
